survey_name: Employee Preferences for Remote Work Technology Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and usability of remote work technology tools to improve future workplace technology investments.

answer_options: Instant messaging (e.g., Slack, Microsoft Teams Chat)
